ðŸ“– Summary: ProcrastiScan is a productivity tool that analyzes content relevance to help users stay focused. It calculates a relevance score for each tab or application and provides interventions like tab blocking or a chatbot when the user becomes distracted. A dashboard allows users to track their focus levels over time.
